Class PlainTextFileHandler

java.lang.Object
  asta.model.PlainTextFileHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFileHandler, java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String>
public class PlainTextFileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFileHandler

a file handler implementation to open and read plain text files

Author:
andreas.gerlach

next

public java.lang.String next()
get the next chunk of information from the file by default the file content is loaded in chunks of 64kb in size additionally it will check for windows line endings and convert them to *nix ones

Specified by:
